page.title: 07WARREN FARM
page.content: The building of Warren Farm House and the creation of a farm from part of the Toddington Manor Estate dates back about 100 years. The farm is now privately owned. The house is being substantially renovated including new roof, damp course and double glazed windows. The size of the accomodation is being increased. The farm was originally a fruit farm with about 100 acres of orchards but the trees were felled in 1979 because they were old and unprofitable. The land is now used for growing wheat and for pasture.
